author: Sam Reynolds
title: Bitcoin Tumbles Below $104K as Israel Strikes Iran
description: Al-Jazeera reports that explosions were heard in Tehran.
content:
Bitcoin 
 has substantially added to earlier losses, now down more than 4% over the past 24 hours to $103,900 as Israeli forces have bombed targets in Tehran, the capital of Iran.Axios first reporte… [+1383 chars]
